CustomField.description: Used to indicate if a note has been created in CPRS. This field was created for Jira ticket number CCCM-14686 and used when signing a note and a duplicate patient is found in VistA.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Please check the checkbox if you have created and signed the note above as a new Progress Note in CPRS
CustomField.label: Progress Note created in CPRS
